validation.date: Must be a date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
validation.time: Must be a time in the format HH:mm
validation.min: Must be greater or equal to {}
validation.max: Must be smaller or equal to {}
validation.str_min_len: Length must be greater or equal to {}
validation.str_max_len: Length must be smaller or equal to {}
validation.str_min_upper.singular: Must contain at least 1 uppercase character
validation.str_min_upper.plural: Must contain at least {} uppercase characters
validation.str_min_lower.singular: Must contain at least 1 lowercase character
validation.str_min_lower.plural: Must contain at least {} lowercase characters
validation.str_min_special.singular: Must contain at least 1 character of !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{{|}}~
validation.str_min_special.plural: Must contain at least {} characters of !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{{|}}~
validation.eq: Must be equals to the field '{}'
validation.ne: Must be different to the field '{}'
validation.ge: Must be greater or euqlas than the field '{}'
validation.gt: Must be greater than the field '{}'
validation.le: Must be smaller or euqlas than the field '{}'
validation.lt: Must be smaller than the field '{}'
